name: FAQ Accordion
description: Frequently asked questions with expandable accordion.

settings.editor: Find answers to common questions about our product and services.

tabs.tab_content: Getting started is easy! Simply sign up for a free account, complete the quick onboarding process, and you'll be ready to go in under 5 minutes. Our setup wizard will guide you through each step.

tabs.tab_title: What payment methods do you accept?
tabs.tab_content: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and bank transfers for annual plans. All payments are processed securely through our payment partners.

tabs.tab_title: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
tabs.tab_content: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings. There are no cancellation fees, and you'll continue to have access until the end of your billing period.
We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all plans. If you're not satisfied within the first 30 days, contact our support team for a full refund, no questions asked.
Absolutely. We use industry-standard encryption (AES-256) for all data at rest and in transit. Our infrastructure is hosted on secure cloud servers with SOC 2 Type II compliance.
Our support team is available 24/7 via live chat, email at support@example.com, or phone. Pro and Enterprise customers also get access to priority support with faster response times.

settings.editor: Can't find what you're looking for? Our support team is here to help.
